result.eng: She went overseas looking for work.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.orig: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.html: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ṫar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.

result.eng: They helped a great deal of people.
result.ga: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoine
result.orig: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoine
result.html: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoineThey helped a great deal of people.
result.ponchtml: Ċuidiġ siad le lear mór daoineThey helped a great deal of people.

result.eng: They found a great deal of explosives.
result.ga: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascach
result.orig: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascach
result.html: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascachThey found a great deal of explosives.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad lear mór d'áḃar pléascaċThey found a great deal of explosives.

result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí thar lear
